description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共运城市委书记，后因受贿罪被判刑。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China who served as the Secretary of the Yuncheng Municipal Committee of the CCP and was later sentenced for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 中国山西省临汾市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Linfen City, Shanxi Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山西省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shanxi Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 山西省人民政府办公厅

zh-cn: 山西省人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 山西省人民政府的综合办事机构。
description.en: The general affairs office of the Shanxi Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 负责山西省建设行政管理的省政府组成部门，后改为山西省住房和城乡建设厅。
description.en: A component department of the Shanxi Provincial Government responsible for construction administration, later renamed the Department of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of Shanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党晋城市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党晋城市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山西省晋城市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Jincheng, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山西省晋城市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jincheng City, Shanxi Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党朔州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党朔州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山西省朔州市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Shuozhou, Shanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党运城市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党运城市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山西省运城市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Yuncheng, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治术语，常用于指代负责纪律检查、监察和调查的政府机构，通常指中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会与中华人民共和国国家监察委员会。
description.en: A political term in the People's Republic of China, often used to refer to government agencies responsible for discipline inspection, supervision, and investigation, typically the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC and the National Supervisory Commission of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任安徽省省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Governor of Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山西省政协副主席，是令计划的兄长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice Chairman of the Shanxi Provincial Political Consultative Conference, and elder brother of Ling Jihua.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山西省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice Governor of Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省徐州市的中级人民法院。
description.en: The intermediate people's court of Xuzhou City, Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 对原中共运城市委书记王茂设的贪腐调查与审判案件。
description.en: The corruption investigation and trial case against former CCP Secretary of Yuncheng, Wang Maoshe.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，王茂设之兄，曾任山西省政协民族宗教委员会副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, brother of Wang Maoshe, and former Deputy Director of the Ethnic and Religious Affairs Committee of the Shanxi Provincial CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，王茂设之兄，曾任中共太原高新区党工委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, brother of Wang Maoshe, and former Party Working Committee Secretary of Taiyuan High-tech Zone.

description.zh-cn: 王茂设之兄。
description.en: Brother of Wang Maoshe.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共运城市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Yuncheng Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共运城市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Yuncheng Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共朔州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Shuozhou Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共朔州市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Shuozhou Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任晋城市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of the Jincheng Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 山西省人民政府办公厅
中国共产党晋城市委员会
中国共产党朔州市委员会
中国共产党运城市委员会

description.zh-cn: 王茂设因涉嫌严重违法违纪被有关部门带走调查。
description.en: Wang Maoshe was taken away by relevant departments for investigation on suspicion of serious violations of law and discipline.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，王茂设与令政策关系交好。
description.en: It is reported that Wang Maoshe had a good relationship with Ling Zhengce.

description.zh-cn: 据报道，王茂设与杜善学关系交好。
description.en: It is reported that Wang Maoshe had a good relationship with Du Shanxue.

description.zh-cn: 徐州市中级人民法院公开宣判王茂设受贿案。
description.en: The Xuzhou Intermediate People's Court publicly announced the verdict in the bribery case of Wang Maoshe.

description.zh-cn: 王茂设因受贿罪被判处有期徒刑15年。
description.en: Wang Maoshe was sentenced to 15 years in prison for bribery.

description.zh-cn: 王茂全牵涉其弟王茂设的腐败案。
description.en: Wang Maoquan was implicated in the corruption case of his brother Wang Maoshe.

description.zh-cn: 王茂同牵涉其弟王茂设的腐败案。
description.en: Wang Maotong was implicated in the corruption case of his brother Wang Maoshe.

description.zh-cn: 王茂建牵涉其弟王茂设的腐败案。
description.en: Wang Maojian was implicated in the corruption case of his brother Wang Maoshe.

description.zh-cn: 王茂全因牵涉其弟王茂设的腐败案被开除党籍。
description.en: Wang Maoquan was expelled from the Communist Party of China for his involvement in his brother Wang Maoshe's corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 王茂建因牵涉其弟王茂设的腐败案被开除党籍。
description.en: Wang Maojian was expelled from the Communist Party of China for his involvement in his brother Wang Maoshe's corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 王茂设接替白云担任中共运城市委书记。
description.en: Wang Maoshe succeeded Bai Yun as Secretary of the Yuncheng Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 王宇燕接替王茂设担任中共运城市委书记。
description.en: Wang Yuyan succeeded Wang Maoshe as Secretary of the Yuncheng Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 王茂设接替田喜荣担任中共朔州市委书记。
description.en: Wang Maoshe succeeded Tian Xirong as Secretary of the Shuozhou Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 王安庞接替王茂设担任中共朔州市委书记。
description.en: Wang Anpang succeeded Wang Maoshe as Secretary of the Shuozhou Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 王茂设接替夏振贵担任晋城市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wang Maoshe succeeded Xia Zhengui as Mayor of the Jincheng Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 王清宪接替王茂设担任晋城市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wang Qingxian succeeded Wang Maoshe as Mayor of the Jincheng Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党运城市委员会

description.zh-cn: 在王茂设被调查后，时任运城市市长的王清宪被宣布主持市委工作。
description.en: After Wang Maoshe was investigated, Wang Qingxian, then mayor of Yuncheng, was announced to preside over the work of the municipal party committee.
